clinical_study.official_title: Policy-Related Survey - Territory-wide Telephone Survey on Tobacco Control

primary_outcome.time_frame: Finish all telephone survey by Sep 2017
primary_outcome.description: Topics included the awareness, use and perception of e-cigarettes, and public support for future tobacco control policies such as enlargement of graphic health warnings on cigarette packaging, tobacco tax increase and endgame.

arm_group.description: Never smokers are those who have never consumed cigarettes in their lifetime.
Ex-smokers are those who consumed cigarettes previously but do not smoke at the time of the survey.
Current smokers are those who, at the time of the survey, consume cigarettes daily or occasionally.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Aged 15 or above
- Cantonese or Mandarin speakers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unable to provide a consent form
- Speak language other than Cantonese and Mandarin
